content: Create greeting model with TypeScript interfaces for Greeting data structure
Create greeting service with in-memory storage (Map) for CRUD operations
Create validation middleware for greeting input validation
Create greetings routes with all 5 CRUD endpoints (POST, GET all, GET by ID, PUT, DELETE)
Integrate greetings routes into main app.ts following existing patterns
Create comprehensive tests for all CRUD operations in greetings.test.ts
Update existing API tests to ensure no regressions
Run linting and type checking to ensure code quality
Run all tests to verify implementation works correctly
Hand off to code-reviewer agent for review as per protocol
